name: Catching Stars
description:
(This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #135 - Theme was Shooting Stars)

Travel around the space collecting stars in an increasingly epic outter space!

---------------------------------------------------------------
I couldn't help but think about the Bag Riders song when I hear theme was Shooting Stars, so I gave it a shot and this came out. Hope you like it! :D 

If you got any suggestions please leave a comment below, your feedback really helps me to be a better game dev.

Thanks for playing!

---------------------------------------------------------------

Instructions:

  • Download the file CatchingStars.rar 
  • Extract the .rar file to a desired location
  • Run CatchingStars.exe
  • Enjoy the trip!

---------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: I do not own the rights of the music used in this game
